title: “Japura Sarasavi Samantha Killing” a biography on murdered university student
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana The book “Japura Sarasavi Samantha Killing” a biography written on undergraduate Ovitigala Samantha who was killed at the University of Sri Jayawardhanapura in 2002 was presented to President Mahinda Rajapaksa.  Activist Samantha was studying in the Management Faculty of the Sri Jayawardenapura University at the…
